servinfo.title: Turn Signal and Hazard Warning Light Symptom Diagnosis

condition.ptxt: Flash rate high or one side only flashes

ps.ptxt: Turn signal / hazard warning relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check turn signal / hazard warning relay referring to Turn Signal and Hazard Warning Relay Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Open circuit or high resistance existing either; between turn signal switch and non lighting bulb, or between hazard warning switch and non lighting bulb

item.ptxt: Use of SUZUKI scan tool makes it easy to check whether a faulty condition is on the input side or output side of BCM. For checking procedure, refer to “Diagnosis Using Output Test Function of SUZUKI Scan Tool” under Scan Tool Data .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

action.ptxt: Replace fuse(s) and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Turn signal / hazard warning relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check turn signal / hazard warning relay referring to Turn Signal and Hazard Warning Relay Inspection .
Check turn signal light switch referring to Turn Signal Light Switch (in Lighting Switch) Inspection .
Check hazard warning switch referring to Hazard Warning Switch Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Open circuit or high resistance existing between battery and switch

action.ptxt: Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Turn signal / hazard warning relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check turn signal / hazard warning relay referring to Turn Signal and Hazard Warning Relay Inspection .
